description: A zealot infected by the BL9. It appears to be sentient, having all characteristics of a normal person except for strangely solemn gaze, deathly pale skin and bloodshot eyes indicating the BL9 presence,  their motive is to kill those that didn't accept the blessing of their "dios", this one is armed with a flail and it seems to know how to use it well.

A zealot infected by the BL9. It appears to be sentient, having all characteristics of a normal person except for strangely solemn gaze, deathly pale skin and bloodshot eyes indicating the BL9 presence,  their motive is to kill those that didn't accept the blessing of their "dios", this one is armed with a spear and it seems to know how to use it well.

A zealot infected by the BL9. It appears to be sentient, having all characteristics of a normal person except for strangely solemn gaze, deathly pale skin and bloodshot eyes indicating the BL9 presence,  their motive is to kill those that didn't accept the blessing of their "dios", this one is armed with a spear and it seems to know how to use it well.
A BL9-infused human with it's head ruptured, revealing a slender, tendril-like whip. This whip is tipped with a sharp and flexible blade.

special_attacks.hit_dmg_u: The %1$s swings it's blade-like whip at you!
special_attacks.hit_dmg_npc: The %1$s swings it's blade-like whip at <npcname>!
special_attacks.no_dmg_msg_u: The %1$s tries to swing it's blade-like whip at you, but fails to penetrate your armor!
special_attacks.no_dmg_msg_npc: The %1$s tries to swings it's blade-like whip at <npcname>, but fails to penetrate their armor!
special_attacks.miss_msg_u: The %s swings it's blade-like whip at you, but you dodge!
special_attacks.miss_msg_npc: The %s swings it's blade-like whip at <npcname>, but they dodge!

special_attacks.monster_message:
<color_light_red>%1$s sweeps it's bladed tendril at %3$s!
The tendril writhes wildly!</color>

description: A zealot infected by the BL9. It appears to be sentient, having all characteristics of a normal person except for strangely solemn gaze, deathly pale skin and bloodshot eyes indicating the BL9 presence,  their motive is to kill those that didn't accept the blessing of their "dios", this one is armed with a sword and it seems to know how to use it well.

A zealot infected by the BL9. It appears to be sentient, having all characteristics of a normal person except for strangely solemn gaze, deathly pale skin and bloodshot eyes indicating the BL9 presence,  their motive is to kill those that didn't accept the blessing of their "dios", this one is armed with a sword and it seems to know how to use it well.
A BL9-induced human with it's head ruptured, revealing a large and slender segmented worm-like parasite. With it's wide-gaping mouth, it can be deadly when it comes to biting.

special_attacks.hit_dmg_u: The %1$s stretches out it's worm-like body swinging at you with it wildly!
special_attacks.hit_dmg_npc: The %1$s stretches out it's worm-like body swinging at <npcname> with it wildly!
special_attacks.no_dmg_msg_u: The %1$s stretches out it's worm-like body trying to swing at you with it wildly, but fails to damage your armor!
special_attacks.no_dmg_msg_npc: The %1$s stretches out it's worm-like body trying to swing at <npcname> with it wildly, but fails to damage their armor!
special_attacks.miss_msg_u: The %s streches out it's worm-like body trying to swing at you with it wildly, but you dodge!
special_attacks.miss_msg_npc: The %s stretches out it's worm-like body trying to swing at <npcname> with it wildly, but they dodge!

special_attacks.no_dmg_msg_u: The %1$s tries to devour you, but fails to penetrate your armor!
special_attacks.no_dmg_msg_npc: The %1$s tries to devour <npcname>, but fails to penetrate their armor!
special_attacks.miss_msg_u: The %s devours you, but you step aside!

description: A zealot infected by the BL9. It appears to be sentient, having all characteristics of a normal person except for strangely solemn gaze, deathly pale skin and bloodshot eyes indicating the BL9 presence,  their motive is to kill those that didn't accept the blessing of their "dios", this one is armed with a crossbow and it seems to know how to use it well.

A zealot infected by the BL9. It appears to be sentient, having all characteristics of a normal person except for strangely solemn gaze, deathly pale skin and bloodshot eyes indicating the BL9 presence,  their motive is to kill those that didn't accept the blessing of their "dios", this one is armed with a crossbow and it seems to know how to use it well.
A BL9-induced human with it's head ruptured, protruding from it is a parasite with several spindly spiky limbs and an acid-drooling orifice.

special_attacks.hit_dmg_u: The %1$s swirls it's spiky body you!
special_attacks.hit_dmg_npc: The %1$s swrils it's spiky body at <npcname>!
special_attacks.no_dmg_msg_u: The %1$s tries to swirl it's spiky body at you, but fails to penetrate your armor!
special_attacks.no_dmg_msg_npc: The %1$s tries to swirl it's spiky body at <npcname>, but fails to penetrate their armor!
special_attacks.miss_msg_u: The %s swirls it's spiky body at you, but you step aside!
special_attacks.miss_msg_npc: The %s swirls it's spiky body at <npcname>, but they dodge!

special_attacks.monster_message: <color_light_red>%1$s vomits a stream of acid at %3$s!</color>

description: A zealot in long red robes wearing a strange skull mask infected by the BL9. It appears to be sentient, having all characteristics of a normal person except for strangely solemn gaze, deathly pale skin and bloodshot eyes indicating the BL9 presence,  their motive is to kill those that didn't accept the blessing of their "dios", this one is armed with a sword and it seems to know how to use it well.

An armored mercenary infected by the BL9. It appears to be sentient, having all characteristics of a normal person except for strangely aggressive and bothered look on it's face, seemingly faster reflexes and bloodshot eyes indicating the BL9 presence,  they will do their best to stop any intruder that managed to infiltrate their compound, this one is armed with a hammer and it seems to know how to use it well.

An armored mercenary infected by the BL9. description: A heavily armored mercenary infected by the BL9. It seems to have grown in size being over 7 feet tall.It appears to be sentient, having all characteristics of a normal person except for strangely very aggressive look on it's face, greater strength and endurance, bloodshot eyes indicating the BL9 presence,  they will do their best to stop any intruder that managed to infiltrate their compound, this one is armed with a huge sledgehammer and it obviously knows how to use it well.
